name: Ferocious Resolve
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/New Racial Rules/Half-Orc Feats/Ferocious Resolve

sections.body: Con 13, half-orc, orc ferocity racial trait.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You gain the ferocity universal monster ability, allowing you to continue fighting at negative hit points. When using this ability, you gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: A half-orc with the orc ferocity racial trait can fight for 1 more round after he is brought below 0 hit points.
